content.html: Rice requires more ingredients to become risotto. Batter isn’t food. Cheese and chips are 2 separate ingredients. Yoghurt requires culture. Cheese and butter making isn’t caused by applying only heat to milk. You were wrong on only every example! Pretty talented!
content.value:
Rice requires more ingredients to become risotto.
Batter isn’t food.
Cheese and chips are 2 separate ingredients.
Yoghurt requires culture.
Cheese and butter making isn’t caused by applying only heat to milk.

You were wrong on only every example!
Pretty talented!
